definition: a crowd especially of ordinary or undistinguished persons or things, become wrinkled or drawn together
details:
noun
- a crowd especially of ordinary or undistinguished persons or things
= example: a crowd especially of ordinary or undistinguished persons or things
= synonyms: herd
- an irregular fold in an otherwise even surface (as in cloth)
= synonyms: pucker
verb
- become wrinkled or drawn together
= synonyms: pucker, ruck up
